definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Thellonking is one of the most productive activities a human being can undertake.
sentences.chinese: 念考是此中最出產性活動己的總稱能夠舉行。

sentences.english: The relationship between bond valence and bond covalency has been investigated by a semiempirical method.
sentences.chinese: 方法研究了固體材料中鍵電荷與鍵共價性的關係。

sentences.english: Compared with utterance understanding, pragmatic presupposition has the basic features of appropriateness and common acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 相對於話語理解，語用預設具備合適性和共知性。

sentences.english: Replaceability is limited to changing the dependency to depend on something different.
sentences.chinese: 可替換性僅限於修改依賴關係以依賴不同的內容。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a successful animal model of steroid-induced osteonecrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的成功製作激素性骨壞死的動物模型。

sentences.english: Colors embody the vivid characteristics of the age and fashion.
sentences.chinese: 色彩是賦有鮮明的時代感和時髦性的。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese literary theory is living, and its structure is organic.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代文論是生命性文論，是一種整體有機結構觀。

sentences.english: Parts for public use and functional segments are the pleas of industri…
sentences.chinese: 公用性和功能性內容是外觀設計專利侵權的抗辯事由。
對換氣機的節能性進行了分析。

sentences.english: Orthogonality conditions of vibration mode functions for bars are derived.
sentences.chinese: 導出杆的主振型函數之正交性條件。

sentences.english: Hydrolytic kinetic resolution(HKR) is an effective way for synthesis of chiral epichlorohydrin.
sentences.chinese: 是目前合成手性環氧氯丙烷的有效方法。

sentences.english: Objectives To study the baroreflex function in patients with vasovagal syncope.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價血管迷走性暈厥患者的壓力反射器功能。

sentences.english: It becomes second nature to adapt your own style to that of the person with whom you are speaking.
sentences.chinese: 這成爲將你的風格與談話者相適應的第二天性。

sentences.english: HF radar backscatter from the ocean surface shows nonlinearities and time variation of its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 高頻波段海洋回波信號表現了非線性和頻譜時變性。

sentences.english: But this is as speculative as Fenner's gloomy forecast.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這和芬納悲觀的預測一樣都是推測性的。

sentences.english: Invasive molar pregnancy is extremely rare, but is one of te pre-cancer stage for choriocarcinoma .
sentences.chinese: 侵襲性葡萄胎非常罕見，但卻是絨癌的一種癌前病變。

definition: therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
qualities that make sth popular or fashionable/(of a disease) epidemic
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
